subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: The new race, presented by Omani officials Thursday, will cover 687 kilometers, or 430 miles, in six daily stages - a reasonable stretch for muscles unaccustomed to exertion since October.
